activities: Vivastream is a social platform for conferences that allows attendees to enter their personal information to be listed in the attendee directory. Vivastream enables conference attendees to better network and connect with one another.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization and customer data. All data collected is either self-entered by our users, or added via automated API.
recoursemech: Direct Marketing Association (DMA) Safe Harbor Program
